desc.p: Date and time during which the modelling price was updated.
Any overrides generated during commit of this record are recorded here.
This is the key for this record.
This must be an integer from 0 to 999.
Price to be used during modelling for this security
Security to which the multivalue set refers
Indicates when this security was last revalued against this price set.
Calculated consideration which will be used during modelling for this security.
Latest yield or discount market price for the security as a percentage to be used during modelling for this security if it is a discounted instrument
